snippet: A Fukushima Daiichi storage pool appears to have lost almost 32,000 gallons, and thousands more could seep out before it can be pumped dry.
abstract: Tens of thousands of gallons of radioactive water leak from large underground storage pool at Japan's crippled Fukushima Daiichi nuclear plant, and thousands more gallons could seep out before faulty pool can be emptied.
lead_paragraph: A Fukushima Daiichi storage pool appears to have lost almost 32,000 gallons, and thousands more could seep out before it can be pumped dry.

headline.seo: Japan Nuclear Plant Leaks Radioactive Water
headline.main: Damaged Nuclear Plant in Japan Leaks Toxic Water
headline.print_headline: Nuclear Plant In Japan Leaks Toxic Water
